name: FunTriviaGame
0:
”Alexa, open fun trivia game”
”Alexa, start fun trivia game”
”Alexa, launch fun trivia game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun trivia game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Fun Trivia Game" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge across a variety of topics. Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each correct answer earns the user one point. Every ten questions, the user's score will be announced.

In multiplayer mode, which supports up to two players, scores are revealed every 20 questions.
